name: MEDICAL_COND_INFO
description: This table contains basic no-add information about medical conditions.

columns.name: MEDICAL_COND_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the medical condition record.

columns.name: MEDICAL_COND_ID_MEDICAL_COND_NAME
columns.description: This contains the name of the medical condition.

columns.name: MEDICAL_COND_NAME
columns.description: This contains the name of the medical condition.
